name: Everything is Broken
description:
Oculus Quest only!

Everything is Broken is a VR  experience about flying a piece of ship spacecraft, made inf 48 hours during #globalgamejam 2020.

  • Trigger and grip does the same thing: picks up pieces of controls.
  • All buttons in the cockpit are interacted by touching them.
  • Your shields are indicated to the right, to repair, must repeatedly tap the button of the side you want to repair.
  • SURVIVE!

The theme was "repair" and I wanted to jam in VR. In hindsight, building a full physics spaceship in VR in a gamejam was a bit of an overscope, but I learned lots and it turned out pretty intense :)

Enjoy!

#ggj20
